articles.author: Michael Bolton
articles.title: Ulster Fans Question Why La Rochelle Fans Were In The Aviva Stadium For Clash - Balls.ie
articles.description: Ulster fans were left unhappy as La Rochelle fans were in attendance at the Aviva Stadium in their 36-29 defeat to the European champions
articles.content:
In a week full of drama for Ulster fans, the drama continued at the Aviva Stadium in a 29-36 defeat to La Rochelle.
Their Champions Cup hopes were at risk after a heavy defeat away to Sale last week… [+3951 chars]

articles.title: World Cup: Croatia wear down fatigued Morocco to win third place - The Straits Times
articles.description:
Orsic’s late first-half strike settles the contest after Dari cancels out Gvardiol’s opener for European side.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: DOHA Morocco coach Walid Regragui had likened third place in the World Cup to a booby prize. But there was no lack of competitiveness on Saturday, as two quick-fire goals were scored before the 10th … [+1977 chars]
